harkadventurer.model

Class Team

  • java.lang.Object
    • harkadventurer.model.Team
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EnemyObserver, FriendlyObserver, Targetable, java.io.Serializable

    public class Team
extends java.lang.Object
implements Targetable, FriendlyObserver, EnemyObserver, java.io.Serializable
    Team-type objects have a name and store a list of characters.
    Since:
    09/10/2017
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Team(java.lang.String inName)
      Constructs a team with the specified name and no characters.
      Team(java.lang.String inName, java.util.LinkedList<Character> inCharacters)
      Constructs a team with the specified name, containing the characters in the provided list.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void addCharacter(Character inChara)
      Adds a character to the team.
      void changeHealth(int amount)
      Changes the health of all characters in the team by the specified amount.
      void enemyDeathUpdate(double healAmount)
      Called when a member of the enemy team dies, heals all characters in the team.
      void friendlyDeathUpdate()
      Called when a member of the team dies, removes the dead character from the team's character list.
      java.util.LinkedList<Character> getCharacters()
      Returns a list of the team's characters.
      java.lang.String getName()
      Returns the team's name.
      int getNumCharacters()
      Returns the number of characters in the team.
      void setCharacters(java.util.LinkedList<Character> inCharacters)
      Sets the team's character list to be equal to the input list.
      void setName(java.lang.String inName)
      Sets the team's name.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Returns a string containing the team's information.

      • changeHealth

        public void changeHealth(int amount)
        Changes the health of all characters in the team by the specified amount. A positive amount heals, a negative amount damages.
        Specified by:
        changeHealth in interface Targetable
        Parameters:
        amount - The amount of damage or healing

      • toString

        public java.lang.String toString()
        Returns a string containing the team's information. This includes the name of the team and the name of each character in the team.
        Specified by:
        toString in interface Targetable
        Overrides:
        toString in class java.lang.Object
        Returns:
        A string containing the team's information

      • friendlyDeathUpdate

        public void friendlyDeathUpdate()
        Called when a member of the team dies, removes the dead character from the team's character list.
        Specified by:
        friendlyDeathUpdate in interface FriendlyObserver

      • enemyDeathUpdate

        public void enemyDeathUpdate(double healAmount)
        Called when a member of the enemy team dies, heals all characters in the team. Characters are healed for a certain percentage of their maximum hit points, determined by the character that died.
        Specified by:
        enemyDeathUpdate in interface EnemyObserver
        Parameters:
        healAmount - The percentage of the team's max health to be healed
